title: Ferromagnetic ZnO nanostructures from an organo zinc complex formulated via Piper Longum L-assisted green synthesis: Multifaceted prospects in photocatalysis, antimicrobial activity, and cell viability studies

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13
